== HOWTO: Fix the en-ZA dictionary ==
The South African English dictionary (installed by the `myspell-en-za` package) is shipped with an invalid `/usr/share/myspell/dicts/en_ZA.aff` file. This has been fixed in Lucid. Enable lucid-updates to receive the fix.
